Uses of Package
org.springframework.test.json

Packages that use org.springframework.test.json
Package
Description
org.springframework.test.json
Testing support for JSON.
org.springframework.test.web.client.match
Contains built-in RequestMatcher implementations.
org.springframework.test.web.reactive.server
Support for testing Spring WebFlux server endpoints via WebTestClient.
org.springframework.test.web.servlet.assertj
AssertJ support for MockMvc.
org.springframework.test.web.servlet.result
Contains built-in ResultMatcher and ResultHandler implementations.
  • Classes in org.springframework.test.json used by org.springframework.test.json
    Class
    Description
    AbstractJsonContentAssert
    Base AssertJ assertions that can be applied to a JSON document.
    AbstractJsonValueAssert
    Base AssertJ assertions that can be applied to a JSON value.
    JsonComparator
    Strategy interface used to compare JSON strings.
    JsonCompareMode
    Modes that can be used to compare JSON.
    JsonComparison
    A comparison of two JSON strings as returned from a JsonComparator.
    JsonComparison.Result
    Comparison results.
    JsonContent
    JSON content which is generally used to provide JsonContentAssert to AssertJ assertThat calls.
    JsonContentAssert
    Default AbstractJsonContentAssert implementation.
    JsonPathValueAssert
    AssertJ assertions that can be applied to a JSON value produced by evaluating a JSON path expression.
